item.title: Nick Carter - Do I Have To Cry For You
item.description:
작곡: N.Carter/B.Kierulf.. / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 61123 / TJ: 20459

Don’t wanna
close the door

give up on it
Don’t wanna
fight no more
Well find a way
around it
Where’s the love
we had
We can make
it last
Tell me

Tell me
what you wanna do
‘Cause I can’t live
my life the way
You want me to
you know

living like we do

let’s start

you know
